snippet: The group, which included canners and other food industry members, said it was heartened by Dow’s response to its concerns.
abstract: Save Our Crops Coalition, group representing fruit and vegetable growers and canners, drops its opposition to regulatory approval of genetically engineered crops resistant to the powerful herbicide 2,4-D; says Dow Agrosciences, subsidiary of crops' developer Dow Chemical, has agreed to take steps to reduce the chances the herbicide would damage crops.
lead_paragraph: The group, which included canners and other food industry members, said it was heartened by Dow’s response to its concerns.

headline.seo: Coalition Drops Opposition to Dow’s Genetically Engineered Crops
headline.main: Coalition Drops Opposition to a Dow Engineered Crop
headline.print_headline: Coalition Drops Opposition To a Dow Engineered Crop
